name: Eat Them All (duygu yaren)
description:
This is my Game Jam Project.  ( Academy Club Game jam )

You are a vampire in the game. 

Your goal is to suck the blood of the villagers and reach the cave. 

When you collect enough villager blood, you can become a bat.

You can move with the W, A, S, D keys. You can turn into a bat by clicking the button on the right when the bar above is full.
